%_FLOWLOGIC																																
PROCESS BEFORE OUTPUT.																																
*&SPWIZARD: PBO FLOW LOGIC FOR TABLECONTROL 'TAB1'																																
  MODULE TAB1_CHANGE_TC_ATTR.																																
*&SPWIZARD: MODULE TAB1_CHANGE_COL_ATTR.																																
  LOOP AT   GT_SPFLI																																
       INTO W_SPFLI																																
       WITH CONTROL TAB1																																
       CURSOR TAB1-CURRENT_LINE.																																
*&SPWIZARD:   MODULE TAB1_CHANGE_FIELD_ATTR																																
  ENDLOOP.																																
																																
 MODULE STATUS_0100.																																
*																																
PROCESS AFTER INPUT.																																
																																
*字段验证																																
  chain.																																
    FIELD:FLD1,FLD2.																																
    MODULE CHECK1.																																
  endchain.																																
  chain.																																
    FIELD:FLD3,FLD4.																																
    MODULE CHECK2.																																
  endchain.																																
*当FLD2的首字符是*时执行CHECK3检查																																
  FIELD FLD2 MODULE CHECK3 ON *-INPUT.																																
																																
*&SPWIZARD: PAI FLOW LOGIC FOR TABLECONTROL 'TAB1'.																																
  LOOP AT GT_SPFLI.																																
    CHAIN.																																
      FIELD W_SPFLI-CARRID.																																
      FIELD W_SPFLI-CARRID.																																
      FIELD W_SPFLI-CONNID.																																
      FIELD W_SPFLI-COUNTRYFR.																																
      FIELD W_SPFLI-CITYFROM.																																
      FIELD W_SPFLI-AIRPFROM.																																
      FIELD W_SPFLI-COUNTRYTO.																																
      FIELD W_SPFLI-CITYTO.																																
      FIELD W_SPFLI-AIRPTO.																																
      FIELD W_SPFLI-FLTIME.																																
      FIELD W_SPFLI-DEPTIME.																																
      FIELD W_SPFLI-ARRTIME.																																
      FIELD W_SPFLI-DISTANCE.																																
      MODULE TAB1_MODIFY ON CHAIN-REQUEST.																																
    endchain.																																
  ENDLOOP.																																
*&SPWIZARD: MODULE TAB1_CHANGE_TC_ATTR.																																
*&SPWIZARD: MODULE TAB1_CHANGE_COL_ATTR.																																
																																
 MODULE USER_COMMAND_0100.																																
MODULE CANCEL AT EXIT-COMMAND.
